documents.document: @LizaetLouise @Creveroeland @jaxx_io Recent changes 2 #XMR protocol now doesn't allow us get needed data to provide wallet services in Jaxx.
@Macr0chip @jaxx_io @monerocurrency TY. We're tuning out unproductive noise & focusing on task at hand, which is improving Jaxx UX.
Neither issues w/ #XMR community nor developers led to halt of @jaxx_io @monerocurrency integration. Thanks for correcting @Cointelegraph
@cryptotalkDE @jaxx_io @monerocurrency No. Changes 2 #XMR protocol broke things & we now can't get needed info to provide wallet services.
@fore_thought @jaxx_io We do not have a release date for v1.2 yet. Hoping weeks not months but very hard to tell at this time.
@BouncePassFTW @jaxx_io We have zero control over the time it takes the bitcoin network to confirm tx. What "speed" did you select for fee?
@fore_thought @jaxx_io There will be no changes in current versions until infrastructure overhaul been completed, tested, ready to deploy
@BouncePassFTW @jaxx_io Please know we don't have any control of confirmations or congestion on the network. What was mining fee you used?
@BouncePassFTW @jaxx_io Depends how much mining fee you selected for the transaction. What speed did you use?
@tiggoos @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Recent changes to protocol doesn't provide inform. required for our wallets to work. Resources exhausted.
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Nothing would make us happier than #xmr in Jaxx so masses could have access / simple experience.
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Hopeful to pick up at a later time. Now shifting focus, hoping #xmr mature so easier for all/masses.
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Correct, 2 month behind on v1.2 release. Full infrastructure overhaul 4 speed/efficiency/accuracy/UX
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Spent 4x costs/time on #xmr then any other. Can't afford more on a single token with no light/tunnel
@tiggoos @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Why what?
@GiftWisdom0306 @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Will or won't?
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Correct. We had it working fine previously but changes made it impossible to get info we need now.
@XMRenthusiast @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Quite a bit. Issue is recent protocol changes do not allow us to retrieve info we need, once had.
@joshuad31 @jaxx_io @monerocurrency np. That's what I thought.
@joshuad31 @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Please clarify your question. Not sure if your trying to be confusing or trying to be "smart".
@AroundTheBlock_ I hear you, but to say that there are not ethereum folk who act "abrasive" would be a false statement.
@AroundTheBlock_ Thanks. Not going to judge community for the work of shills & trolls. Really want to have @monerocurrency in @jaxx_io
Have a question regarding @jaxx_io decision to halt @monerocurrency integration? Ask away, I'll respond to those I can answer or desire to.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying- Michael Jordan
Wishing @exodus_io luck w/ @monerocurrency. Reached out 2 them 2 compare notes. We may have some tools / libraries to assist them. @jaxx_io
@hohhle @geoTomJ @JoeFegs @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Sorry we weren't able 2 come thru. Hope others will b able to deliver. #xmr is tough.
@Jorj_X_McKie @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Agreed. Hope to revisit in future when timing better & #xmr is more developed / easier to work with.
@BBrothersBakery @jaxx_io @monerocurrency We had transactions working but it was unreliable & we couldn't stabilize with new infrastructure.
Saddens me to announce we've halted @jaxx_io @monerocurrency near term integration plans. Too many difficulties. Need to refocus resources.
@JoeFegs @zcashgpumining @jaxx_io @Jaxx_Support We haven't scheduled a release date yet. Maybe not what people want to hear but it the truth
@zcashgpumining @jaxx_io @Jaxx_Support Due 2 performance issues we halted new iOS coins until infrastructure rebuild complete. Almost ready.
@CryptoBoh @jaxx_io Not months. A few weeks is the target..
@CryptoBoh @jaxx_io Once the infrastructure overhaul is complete and testing has been done it will be released. 1.2 will be a major release.
@paulvigna tomorrow.
Excited for the kickoff of @SatoshiRoundtbl @rogerkver @adam3us @fluffyponyza @SilkRoadFlip @brucefenton @jaxx_io @DECENTRALca @wancynu
I'll be @ the Tampa Bay Bitcoineers meetup tonight with @rogerkver @CharlieShrem. Join us! https://t.co/YV6m1wPDfB @Airbitz @TampaBayBitcoin
@Ben_BitConseil @DECENTRALca @jaxx_io Happy to hear we have fans. We haven't developed it in a couple years since the focus is on Jaxx.
@Ben_BitConseil @DECENTRALca @jaxx_io We plan on providing a much better & still "instant" product using Jaxx as the framework. Stay tuned!
Blockchain Angels Invest $1 Million in Bitcoin-Ethereum Hybrid Qtum https://t.co/9gPYbPjqP7 via @CoinDesk
@BassBauman @jaxx_io @KmdePfyffer 1-2 week's. It's not just about @monerocurrency, but whole new infrastructure deployment. Major release.
@JohnAlanWoods @jaxx_io That's the magic of crypto, blockchain, and cool design on our part. Nothing is stored on servers either.
@IBMBluemixHelp @IBMBluemix PW shouldn't green checkmark w/ unacceptable PW. Why can't use symbols? Very poorly designed, 1st impression.
Trying to sign up for @IBMBluemix but can't get past registration screen due to bug with password fields. @IBMBluemixHelp Help?
@stjopey @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Nothing yet except we have a major release coming soon & we're just tying up loose ends. Stay tuned.
@jorgeluisfarias @jaxx_io Happy New Year! It's in the works. Multi language support expected in 1st quarter 2017.
@HGSupport I've got tons of feedback 2 provide, feel free 2 have management contact me. I'm moving on & not going to take further initiative
Pisses me off when confusing system/process tactics are used when trying to cancel a service. Reinforces decision to leave tho. @HostGator
@lightcoin @jgarzik @SatoshiLite @barrysilbert No worries. The limitations of twitter's 140 :)
@lightcoin @jgarzik @SatoshiLite @barrysilbert DIdn't say its a use case. We're developing the wallets and tools 2 enable use case execution
@stjopey @jaxx_io @monerocurrency We're back to normal hours on the 3rd, expect an announcement soon after.
@CryptoPsych Thanks Ben! Hope you did too. Announcements coming soon after our holiday break. #xmr
@randomname77777 @jgarzik @SatoshiLite @barrysilbert Ok. @dogecoin coming to @jaxx very soon!
@jgarzik @SatoshiLite @barrysilbert Also back-ends & tools 4 all coins supported. I see enterprises services play to assist emerg. use cases
@jgarzik @SatoshiLite @barrysilbert Jaxx (blockchain browser) provides means to manage & move #Litecoin, & interact w/ other chains. 1/2
@SkyzaLimitPro @MyMonero @Apple @monerocurrency @AppStore Most definitely, stay tuned.
@onyx4k @jaxx_io Enterprise services, Integrations eg. shapeshift, pro ver,, hardware, to name a few :) btw not open source, auditable code.
@Aeloxcom @jaxx_io Something we've considered but not in near dev pipeline. Focus is on app infrastructure, security, more coins, better UX
@ImpossibleBTC @jaxx_io Thanks for the heads up. We're aware and it's already been fixed for next release.
@Aeloxcom @jaxx_io Not missing, in the works. Stay tuned!
@throughnothing @jaxx_io @monerocurrency we're excited too!
@CryptoPsych @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Thanks for the kind words.
@CryptoPsych @jaxx_io Yes. More coins to be announced soon. Stay tuned.
@_JohnWhelan @jaxx_io Yes! Stay tuned for announcements.
@SteffenTwits @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Will be working on our Hardware 2017. Also integrate @BitcoinTrezor @LedgerHQ https://t.co/MMofZyAOUn
@ManMachine10101 @jedigras @jaxx_io @monerocurrency It's already on Android and 6 other of our platforms. News on iOS coming soon.
@jaxx_io @monerocurrency Please note full address is not shown but is scroll-able in app to view its entirety.

We are still working with assistance from @fluffyponyza on the @jaxx_io @monerocurrency integration. More updates soon.
@raphaelshalaby @jaxx_io @monerocurrency Hey! That hasn't been determined yet. Hopefully we'll have some good news for you soon.

@EricBarbs @jaxx_io Thanks! We'll keep trying to be better and do cool things. Promise.
@EricBarbs @jaxx_io Cool! Know that we have no plans to stop being transparent on our own social channels.
@UdjinM6 @jaxx_io I think path is to use our own channels & direct communities there, especially since we're servicing many different ones.
Finding more transparent I am with communities, ie #reddit, more complex & time consuming it becomes.. & less efficient we are at @jaxx_io

Scared to catch up on Reddit. Taken time 2 reflect on situation, evaluate my posts, & learn from ordeal & be better @monerocurrency @jaxx_io
